tips.title: Watch your language!
tips.text: The linter will give you some errors if you don't have the language set in the head.

tips.title: ES6 is nice
tips.text: If you're building an ES6 app you're not required to use ';' at the end of lines of code.

tips.title: ES5 is weird
tips.text: If you're stuck in ES5 and making a for loop that adds event listeners, you must make it using foreach rather than for. In ES6 this is solved by using let instead of var.

tips.title: Scriptable objects
tips.text: Use scriptable objects for items or anything that's supposed to be easily customizable
